chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
R: relation T
ord: order R
ub_of_chain: forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x

Goal:
exists x : T, maximal R x

Premises:

chain : relation ?T -> Ensemble ?T -> Prop where ?T : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R ub_of_chain : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x |- Type]

Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope

Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Ensemble _%type_scope
ord_refl : order ?R -> reflexive ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R ub_of_chain : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x |- Type] ?R : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R ub_of_chain : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x |- relation ?A]
ord_trans : order ?R -> transitive ?R where ?A : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R ub_of_chain : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x |- Type] ?R : [T : Type R : relation T ord : order R ub_of_chain : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x |- relation ?A]

tower_is_chain : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> forall (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}), chain R (tower T R chain_sup inflation)
tower_sind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> SProp), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) -> forall t : T, tower T R chain_sup inflation t -> P t
tower_ind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> Prop), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) -> forall t : T, tower T R chain_sup inflation t -> P t
sup_intro : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (S : Ensemble T), Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> forall c : chain R S, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))

Inductive tower (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) : Ensemble T := sup_intro : forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) ->...-> In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (inflation x)) Arguments tower _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments sup_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments inflation_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope

pose proof (ub_of_chain (tower T R chain_sup inflation)).
destruct H as [x Hx].
